query: WITH entities AS (SELECT committee_id, id FROM policies WHERE ((committee_id IS NOT DISTINCT FROM $3) AND COALESCE(id < $2, true) OR COALESCE(committee_id < $3, committee_id IS NOT NULL)) ORDER BY committee_id DESC NULLS LAST, id DESC LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: PolicyId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN policy_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.committee_id desc nulls last, i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
